channel.title: How-To Geek
channel.description: We explain technology. Learn more with our articles, reviews, tips, and the best answers to your most pressing tech questions.

item.title: Everything Coming to Prime Video in October 2025
item.dc:creator: Chris Snellgrove
item.description: Prime Video has tricks, treats, and everything else. Here are the most delicious shows and movies you can stream in October!
item.content:encoded: Are you looking for something new to watch in October? Or maybe some old favorites to fall in love with all over again? Either way, Prime Video has you covered!

item.title: Type Faster on iPhone With This Hidden Feature
item.dc:creator: Tim Brookes
item.content:encoded: Are you still tapping your thumbs on your iPhone’s screen to type? It might shock you to hear that there’s been a better way to type since iOS 13 was introduced in 2019.

item.title: 13 Shows Like Black Mirror to Twist Your Mind
item.dc:creator: Keeley Brooks
item.description: Zone out on these mind-bending series and their wild scenarios.
item.content:encoded: Since its 2011 premiere, Black Mirror has remained one of the most intriguing and captivating anthology series. Over seven mind-bending seasons, the dystopian spectacle explores the implications of advanced technologies on individuals and society as a whole, while blending relatable scenarios and thought-provoking sci-fi with real-world anxieties.

item.title: Why You Should Pay Extra for a Good Phone Case
item.dc:creator: Andy Betts
item.description: Don't protect your $1000 investment with a $10 piece of plastic.
item.content:encoded: Most of us use cases on our phones, yet it's strange how often we protect our $1000 investments with a $10 piece of plastic. Instead of buying the cheapest case you can find, it's worth paying a little extra. It'll look better, last longer, and give your phone a lot more protection.

item.title: Raspberry Pi OS Just Got Its Debian Trixie Upgrade
item.dc:creator: Corbin Davenport
item.description: Unlike Debian 13 Trixie, it still supports 32-bit hardware.
item.content:encoded: Rapsberry Pi OS, the default operating system for Pi boards and computers, has a new major release. The new update is based on Debian 13.1 Trixie, with some design improvements, simpler controls, and more package options.

item.title: Affinity Photo, Designer, and Publisher Are All Free for iPad
item.dc:creator: Jorge A. Aguilar
item.description: Get these apps now before the price comes back.
item.content:encoded: In a sudden, unannounced, and potentially fleeting move, Serif has made all of its Affinity iPad apps entirely free. This isn't a simple extended trial; users who move quickly can secure what appears to be a lifetime license for Affinity Designer 2, Affinity Photo 2, and Affinity Publisher 2.

item.title: I Regret Buying the Pixel 10
item.dc:creator: Aman Kumar
item.description: The Google Pixel 10 feels more like a luxury splurge than a value-for-money deal.
item.content:encoded: The iPhone 13 had been my main device since 2022, but this year I replaced it with the Google Pixel 10. I've been using Google's latest smartphone for over a month now, and unfortunately, I am regretting my decision to switch.

item.title: The Baseus PrimeTrip VD1 Pro Offers First-ever Hardwire-free Parking Monitoring
item.dc:creator: Sponsored
item.description: This article is sponsored by Baseus.
item.content:encoded: Dash cams are becoming an essential add-on for both private and commercial vehicles. Anything can happen out on the road or when your vehicle is parked somewhere, and insurance companies are incentivized to look for any reason to deny your claims. Not to mention that there are bad actors out there looking to commit insurance fraud at your expense!

item.title: Think Switching to an EV Is Hard? Try Transitioning Back to Gas
item.dc:creator: Bertel King
item.description: There's much about a combustion engine that feels quite dated.
item.content:encoded: A lot of people are afraid, intimidated, or outright angered by the thought of having to switch to an electric car. That's valid—the way these cars function is quite different. But once you've reconfigured your life around EVs, the frustrations of switching back to a gas-powered car are greater than you might think.

item.title: Are Kobalt Power Tools at Lowe's Worth Buying?
item.dc:creator: Cory Gunther
item.description: What DIYers need to know about Lowe's power tool line.
item.content:encoded: When you need a new power tool and wander into any big-box hardware store, you'll see all sorts of options on the shelves. Power tools come in various styles, brands, and price points. Do you own any of the blue Kobalt tools from Lowe's? Here's where Kobalt tools are made and whether they're worth buying.
